sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO businessenter( openindex, storename, region, category, phone, email, address, name, inquire, rdate
) VALUES ( businessenter_seq.nextval, '$storename$', '$region$', '$category$', '$phone$', '$email$', '$address$', '$name$', '$inquire$', sysdate )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
storename, region, category, phone, email, address, name, inquire
FROM businessenter
